description: Hydropower global land suitability maps, referred to as "development potential indices" (DPIs). Created through spatial multi-criteria decision analysis techniques that accounted for both resource potential and development feasibility.
title: Hydroelectric Development Potential Index
citation: Oakleaf, J. R., Kennedy, C. M., Baruch-Mordo, S., Gerber, J. S., West, P. C., Johnson, J. A., & Kiesecker, J. (2019). Mapping global development potential for renewable energy, fossil fuels, mining and agriculture sectors. Scientific Data, 6(1), 1–17. https://doi.org/10.1038/s41597-019-0084-8
